captions.text:
Hello, I'm Tom Hiddleston, recording this
from my kitchen.

This is just to say that I'm on my last day,
my fifth day, of the Live Below The Line challenge

The challenge is to live off a pound a day
of food and drink for 5 days, to raise awareness

for the 1 billion children all over the world
in the poorest countries and communities who
have to live off that every single day.

You too can do it on the 29th April to the
3rd May (2014) - just go to http://livebelowtheline.com/uk

In the meantime, it's time for my lunch, which
as you'll see is the glorious and simple pleasure
Never has a baked potato looked so good.
That probably cost me about 10 pence.

Thank you so much for all your support. It's
time to eat.

title: Tom Hiddleston Live Below The Line Day 5
